title: Hit Girl
description:
From USA Today bestselling author Tia Louise comes a stand-alone love story about revenge and redemption.
My finest trick? Making you think Iâ€™ve forgotten...Names on a list.Faces in a crowd.One little girl.He told me to get over it, let it go. I can't do that. I want them to pay.Every. Last. One.(A STAND-ALONE, second-chance romance.)
author: Tia Louise
